New Records: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. tied Rafael Devers with 37 extra-base hits by the age of 25
Key Match Events: Boston Red Sox defeated Toronto Blue Jays 6-3 in the series game
Pre-Game Insights: The Blue Jays were aiming to extend their winning streak, while the Red Sox were 4.0 games back of the Twins for the wild card
Post-Match Reflections: The loss ended the Blue Jays' streak, and the Red Sox moved closer to the playoffs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Guerrero Jr.'s impressive season stats and resilience despite trade rumors
